text: #HANNITY: Lawlessness explodes in Dem cities. Exclusive interview with parents who want CHOP shut down after their 19-year-old was fatally shot there. Guests: @TedCruz, @DBongino, @GeraldoRivera, @LawrenceBJones3, @PeteHegseth, @KarlRove, @GovMikeHuckabee & @MikeRowe. Watch!
